entry.title: Boring Article
entry.content:
Since I returned to Xinjiang,I have to eat and sleep everyday.I was so bored,then I had this article.

 Befor I came to Xinjiang,I hope I can take many beatuiful pictures,eat my favorite food and do what I want to do.But now the only way to take pictures just can with mobile phone,Cameras can not be used.Every day.I eat with my parents.butI can not eat what I want.Finally,I care too much about me .I thought that home is to be free and easy to call home.I always manage my family,which is called cage!

 In fact.this article is a dissemination of negative energy.If you are unhappy,I am sorry.My father just came back,he said that his business is finished.the rest of the time can enjoy.I hope the next summer life will be enriched!
entry.summary: Since I returned to Xinjiang,I have to eat and sleep everyday.I was so bored,then I had this article.

entry.title: MyCuteSister-1
entry.content:
The article is the next article of â€œMyCuteSisterâ€.

 Next article we talk about my sister something not bad and sheâ€™s appearance,this article letâ€™s we talk about sheâ€™s school work.

 My sister is seven years old,she attended Maria Kindergarten in GuangZhou.When she was a kindergraten student,she was excellent.She often become monitor of class.

 She can also draw.Since she attended kindergraten,almost every week draw a works,So for about two hundred draw works stayed we home.

 She can also dance.She use weekend time learn dance,Since she canâ€™t back bend,thwart split to be dance a complete dance.And She often join Kindergraten activites,Our whole famliy is proud for her.

 By the way,She can also play the piano,Whennever I am bored.I watch the video of her playing the piano,Which make me feel better immediately.

 She will become a Primary Student,Because she went up THE AFFILIATED SCHOOL OF GUANGDONG UNIVERSITY OF FOREIGN STUDIES,Bug she need stay at school,I think I will very miss her.

&esp;This is my sister,And I LOVE HER.
entry.summary: The article is the next article of â€œMyCuteSisterâ€.

entry.title: MyCuteSister-0
entry.content:
Last article is so bad,so this article i want is not bad.

 I have a young sister,she is so cute and pretty.Now I will introduce her.Ok letâ€™s do it.

She have a black long hair,and clear and shinning eyes.When she lie on soft reading booksï¼ŒI always think she so beatuiful and cute.At this point,I will ask her,what book are reading? then she always say cartoon book,At this point,I say,Why you read cartoon book? She say,because i like it.

Letâ€™s talk about sheâ€™s not good,also many childrenâ€™s problems.It picky eaters,such as,she dislike eggplantï¼ŒI tell her do not picky eaters,she say ok.
entry.summary: Last article is so bad,so this article i want is not bad.

entry.title: MyCollegeLife
entry.content:
About three years ago,I left my school where I stayed for seven years.I lose so many friends,day and night accompany friend.Of course,including you.

 Three years after,I become a college studentï¼ŒMaybe you guessed this article is about my college life.About at 2019-9-1 start my college lift.I think I have very excited at that time.

 Before school startï¼ŒI participate in Military training.Remember that time ,about one hundred peoples trained in a groups together,Instructor look we are tired,then he will say:â€Everyboby listen! Drop Down!â€ï¼ŒIn the twinkling of an eye one hundred peoples on the ground lie.This time nobody care isnâ€™t dirtyï¼Œjust look the skyï¼Œthinkï¼ŒTHE SKY SO BEATUIFUL.

 The fight of timeï¼Œmilitary training will done.This time Not only have one hundred peoples,enough seven to ten hundred peoples.We sing school song together and with in millitary training time knowâ€™s friend add WeChat Friendï¼ŒOf courseï¼Œme too.

 Speak the true talk.When our instructor go back to armyï¼ŒMy eyes are wetï¼Œwet is not to say I love crying,Itâ€™s because he teach for me so many knowledge.

 At the lastï¼ŒI sincerely thank my instructorï¼ŒPeace!
entry.summary: About three years ago,I left my school where I stayed for seven years.I lose so many friends,day and night accompany friend
